Like, you can either have account based or Utxo based, where in the account based, you have accounts, and in the UtxO based, you have Utxos. But in the account based, you commit state routes. In the Utxo based, you commit transaction routes. And the difference is that with the account based, we currently do not have a good scheme for maintaining safety. So this is why we go with the Utxo based for now. And so every block gets committed to the original chain. And this shows that the plasma chain, it must have like the same block time, at least the same block time as the original chain. Why is that?
